code: import React from'react';import harshit from'./Images/harshit.jpg';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Diseases(){const diseases=[{name:"Hairfall",url:harshit},{name:"Skin Diseases",url:harshit},{name:"Digestive Issues",url:harshit},{name:"Cardiovascular Diseases",url:harshit}];const renderDisease=(content,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cardDisease p-2 col-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"imgi",src:content.url,alt:"first",width:"200px",height:"200px",style:{borderRadius:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"diseaseName",children:content.name})]},index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"headers",children:["Treament Available for Diseases",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"diseaseContainer row oveflow-hidden",children:diseases.map((content,index)=>renderDisease(content,index))})]});}export default Diseases;
